text: Philip Charles Bradbourn, (9 August 1951 â€“ 19 December 2014) was a British politician, and Member of the European Parliament for the West Midlands, for the Conservative Party. He was a member of the European Parliament from 1999 to 2014. Bradbourn was born in Tipton, Warwickshire. He died of bowel cancer, aged 63. ==Other websites== *West Midlands Conservative MEP Team Category:1951 births Category:2014 deaths Category:MEPs for the United Kingdom Category:Politicians from Warwickshire
title: Philip Bradbourn
